ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Staff code number of person completing this form
Date of Data Entry
Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
How often did you drink beer?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a week; 3 = Once or twice a week; 4 = 3 or 4 times a week; 5 = Most every day

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: How many drinks of beer did you usually have in one sitting?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = 1 or 2 drinks; 3 = 3 or 4 drinks; 4 = 5-9 drinks; 5 = 10 or more drinks

ElementDescription: How often did you drink wine?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a week; 3 = Once or twice a week; 4 = 3 or 4 times a week; 5 = Most every day

ElementDescription: How many drinks of wine did you usually have in one sitting?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = 1 or 2 drinks; 3 = 3 or 4 drinks; 4 = 5-9 drinks; 5 = 10 or more drinks

ElementDescription: How often did you drink liquor?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a week; 3 = Once or twice a week; 4 = 3 or 4 times a week; 5 = Most every day

ElementDescription: How many drinks of liquor did you usually have in one sitting?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = 1 or 2 drinks; 3 = 3 or 4 drinks; 4 = 5-9 drinks; 5 = 10 or more drinks

ElementDescription: How many times did you use marijuana?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a month; 3 = Once or twice a month; 4 = Weekly; 5 = Daily; 6 = More than 1-2 times a day

ElementDescription: How many times did you use tranquilizers?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a month; 3 = Once or twice a month; 4 = Weekly; 5 = Daily; 6 = More than 1-2 times a day

ElementDescription: How many times did you use PCP?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a month; 3 = Once or twice a month; 4 = Weekly; 5 = Daily; 6 = More than 1-2 times a day

ElementDescription: How many times did you use Cocaine or other Amphetamines?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a month; 3 = Once or twice a month; 4 = Weekly; 5 = Daily; 6 = More than 1-2 times a day

ElementDescription: How many times did you use Hallucinogenics?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a month; 3 = Once or twice a month; 4 = Weekly; 5 = Daily; 6 = More than 1-2 times a day

ElementDescription: How many times did you use any other street drugs?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Less than once a month; 3 = Once or twice a month; 4 = Weekly; 5 = Daily; 6 = More than 1-2 times a day

ElementDescription: During the days from [month_sdate] to [month_edate], did you spend any days as an inpatient in a hospital or rebab or in jail or prison?
If inpatient in a hospital or rehab - How many days out of this period did you spend as an inpatient in a hospital or rehab?
If inpatient in jail or prison - How many days out of this period did you spend as an inpatient in jail or prison?
